label: ReturnableAssetInstructions
comment: The procedures to follow for returnable assets, such as reusable packaging (pallets, crates).

datatypeProperties.comment: A deposit value specified in these returnable asset instructions.
A textual description of the terms and conditions for these returnable asset instructions.
The code specifying the description of the terms and conditions for these returnable asset instructions.

objectProperties.comment: The specified period during which the deposit value specified in these returnable asset instructions is valid.
